headline: Consolidated Edison (ED) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: Con Ed (ED) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 1.03% and 2.56%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Consolidated Edison (ED) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
raw.summary: Con Ed (ED) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 1.03% and 2.56%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Con Ed: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had profit of 89 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 98 cents per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Con Ed: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had profit of 89 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 98 cents per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

headline: CON EDISON REPORTS 2024 EARNINGS
summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) (NYSE: ED) today reported 2024 net income for common stock of $1,820 million or $5.26 a share compared with $2,519 million or $7.25 a share in 2023. Adjusted earnings (non-GAAP) were $1,868 million or $5.40 a share in 2024 compared with $1,762 million or $5.07 a share in 2023. Adjusted earnings and adjusted earnings per share in 2024 exclude adjustments to the gain and other impacts related to the sale of all of the stock of Con Edison's former subsidiary,
